availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Bluford Bogan (Simpson County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret R. Neely Bogan in Logan County, Kentucky, on January 25, 1844. Married to Mary Jane Bogan. Father of Martha J. Bogan, Mary Emily Bogan, and Nancy L. Bogan. Resident in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1830. Resident in Simpson County in 1840. Owned one enslaved person in Simpson County in 1840. Farmer in Simpson County in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 191.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 63B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 46.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, Subdistrict 150, p. 112A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Logan County Marriages, Film #002134965, p. 347 (accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Simpson County Administration Bonds, 1830-1869; Vol 19-20, 1970-1975, p. 76 of microfilm (accessed via ancestry.com on September 22, 2020).
